review: Brilliant movie. Don't go by the introduction of the movie. It's not just a love story between an upper caste girl and a lower caste boy. It's lot more than that. It has a strong spiritual angle to it which has not been dealt with in Hindi Cinema. This one presents it in a very nice way...
A beutiful movie with a storyline very close to my heart .Forgiveness ,love beyond the border of this physical world,i have no words to describe its magic.
It's portrait well about how to accept and forgive  people, it show how  spirituality , faith and their beliefs ...change personality ..in a positive way .
Fantastic movie but irony is that, it was a commercially unsuccessful movie. Indian movie goers need miles to go to free them from bit immaturity.
